casebody.data:
GERAWAN FARMING, INC., petitioner,
v.
AGRICULTURAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD. No. 17-1375. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 1, 2018.

Motion of The NFIB Small Business Legal Center, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of California denied.
